title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Short-Intensive Web-Based Course on Understanding and Practicing Chemical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic chemical terminology and concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Students can explain fundamental chemistry concepts (atomic structure, chemical bonding, chemical reactions) with over 80% accuracy.
Students can simulate chemical experiment processes three or more times using virtual lab modules and record observations.
Students improve their chemistry problem-solving skills by over 70% through quiz- and game-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
